name: Jahu
description:
Corporeal laws are unwrit

As suns and love retreat
Wahre Gesetze wurden umgeschrieben\n\nAls die Sonne und Liebe verschwanden
languages.name: Jahu

description: L'ordre retiré, ne reste que le doute,\n\nLe Soleil oublié, l'Amour en déroute.
languages.name: Jahu

description: Ogni legge corporea va cancellando\n\nMentre i soli e l'amore si stanno eclissando
languages.name: Jahu

description: 물질계가 내거는 불문의 법칙에는\n\n태양도 사랑도 물러날지언대
languages.name: 자후

description: Las leyes físicas no están escritas\n\nMientras los soles y el amor dan marcha atrás
languages.name: Jahu

description: 定律归零\n\n太阳和爱退缩
languages.name: Jahu

description: Законы материи попраны\n\nКогда солнца и любовь утрачены
languages.name: Джаху

description: 体を仕切る法などない\n\n陽と愛が引くなら
languages.name: Jahu

description: Prawa cielesne nie są pisane\n\nGdy słońca i miłość przygasają
languages.name: Jahu

description: As leis materiais se apagam\n\nEnquanto os sóis e o amor recuam
languages.name: Jahu

description: 重塑不成文的物質法則\n\n正如烈日消散與愛意褪去
languages.name: Jahu

description: กฎหมายที่ไม่ได้ประทับเป็นลายลักษณ์\n\nดุจดั่งความรักและดวงตะวันที่ถอยหนี
languages.name: Jahu

description: Güneşler ve aşk geri çekilirken\n\nFiziksel kanunlar geçerli değildir
languages.name: Jahu

description: Неписані тілеснії закони,\nяк сонце і любов зника.
languages.name: Джаху
